text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria globicephala is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Kerala and Tamil Nadu in India.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Psychotria globicephala". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31211A9613734. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31211A9613734.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
